attributes.action: Switch the Intercity Express Train contract awarded to Japanese firm Hitachi and place it with Bombardier in Derby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Derby is the last city in Britain where railway rolling stock is built and 2,200 jobs are at stake here. Awarding the contract to Bombardier would safeguard those jobs, as well as the future of railway engineering in this country which is, after all the birthplace of the railway.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
